tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CreditInquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  inquiry_date DATE,
  approval_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE CreditHistory (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    inquiry_id INT NOT NULL,
    approval_id INT,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);
